member.name: T:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.GalleryController
member.summary: API to manage tile galleries for an authenticated user.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.GalleryController.GetUserGalleries(System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Get the list of galleries the user has created.
member.param: If true then also include the galleries that have been marked as public.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.GalleryController.CreateGallery(System.String)
member.returns: The gallery id to use for adding tiles to the gallery.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.GalleryController.DeleteGallery(System.String)
member.param: The id of the gallery to delete.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.GalleryController.SubmitGalleryImportJob(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Start an import job to add images from a zip file to a gallery.
member.param: URL to a zip file of images that will be imported.

member.name: T:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.MosaicController
member.summary: API to manage mosaics for an authenticated user.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.MosaicController.GetUserMosaic
member.summary: Get the list of mosaics for a user. The mosaic will contain temporary URL to the actual mosaic images.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.MosaicController.GetAllMosaic
member.summary: Gets a feed of all of the mosaics created. This API requires Admin access.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.MosaicController.DeleteMosaic(System.String)
member.param: The id of the mosaic to delete.

member.name: M:CloudMosaic.API.Controllers.MosaicController.SubmitMosaicJob(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts a job to create the mosaic.
member.param: The gallery id to use to create the mosaic.
The name of the mosaic to be created.
The URL to the image to be converted into a mosaic.
